<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82012</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>6148</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Antonyms Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre antónimos</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist faoi Fhrithainmneacha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Antonym-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu d'antonymes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Dos Antonyms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz Di Antonyms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων αντωνύμων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The pupils will know what antomyms are. They will know several examples of antomyms. They will consolidate their understanding of antonyms.</string>
            <string language="es">Los alumnos sabrán lo que son los antónimos Conocerán varios ejemplos de antónimos. Consolidarán su comprensión de los antónimos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Beidh a fhios ag na daltaí céard is frithainmneacha ann. Beidh roinnt samplaí de fhrithainmneacha ar eolas acu. Láidreoidh siad a dtuiscint ar fhrithainmneacha.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schüler wissen, was antomyms sind. Sie
kennen einige Beispiele von antomyms. Sie vereinigen ihr 
Verständnis von Antonymen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les élèves sauront ce que sont les antomyms. 
Ils sauront plusieurs exemples des antomyms. Ils 
consolideront leur arrangement des antonymes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os alunos saberão o que os antomyms são. 
Saberão diversos exemplos dos antomyms. Consolidarão sua
compreensão dos antonyms.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi conosceranno che cosa i antomyms 
sono. Conosceranno parecchi esempi dei antomyms. 
Consolideranno la loro comprensione dei antonyms.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές ξέρουν τι antomyms είναι. Ξέρουν 
διάφορα παραδείγματα των antomyms. Θα παγιώσουν την 
κατανόηση αντωνύμων τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
